title: Spikes Studio | Ai clip generator for YouTube Twitch TikTok & Reels
introduction: Spikes Studio is a generative AI video editor that repurposes long videos into viral clips with just one click. It offers a complete editing environment for refining videos effortlessly, with features like trimming, extending, and customizing clips. The platform accelerates high-quality video content creation and provides mobile support for seamless functionality on the go. Spikes Studio also supports Twitch broadcast auto-processing and editing short-form content for platforms like TikTok or Instagram Reels.
pricing: Start with the free plan and upgrade as needed.
